ShortDescription.Value: Increases number of workers and other small adjustments for Service Buildings.

Publish.LongDescription:
**Config-XML**
- This mod potentially allows for virtually any change to Service buildings. - At the moment, it mainly increases number of workers in Services buildings and other small adjustments (see below for details). - You could just install it as-is with no custom edits. - Think of this mod as a simple text-like file that players can edit (or not since a nice preset file is included). - Prefab info is applied before any city is loaded, so no game system required (means essentially no performance impact).
Number of **preset** buildings and extensions: **222**.
### Quick-Start
- ✅ Just select "PRESETS" and done. - Curated presets increase the **number of workers** and other small adjustments (details below). - Wages are scaled up/down (game senses worker change and auto adjusts).
### Details - Curated Presets - All buildings have more workers. Required education level for jobs is adjusted in 'some' buildings, and other allowed tweaks. - Presets design: some have only a few more workers, and some have many. - Better utilize large buildings that previously had few workers, and may help reduce unemployment. - Example: University is normally 170 workers, this mod preset increases it to 400 as this is a big campus for 15,000 students. - Rebuild existing buildings to see new config changes. - Add these companion mods to also Increase Students or Transit Passengers - See Power Users if you want to adjust the presets yourself.
### Power Users - Easily tweak all player adjustable config file as you wish. - ✅ Open Options > Custom > [Open Config folder] to create a customizable Config.xml file. - Refer to info / examples in Config.xml for how to add / alter components (edit with Notepad++ or similar). - New changes can be "Applied" even during the game without a restart (options menu).
### Notes
- DLC entries only work if you own the DLC and can plop the items. - Safety: mod does **not** modify save files or any game systems. - Can be removed at any time - already plopped buildings retain modded values and new buildings will have vanilla values. - Performance: this is a lightweight configuration mod. It only does a short pass when applying settings (on game load or when you click APPLY). It does not add any per-frame systems, so it essentially has no impact on performance. - Works with mods: Adjust School, Adjust Transit, Magic Mail, Magic Garbage, as this mod is focused on the number of workers and those do not. - Magic Hearse and Achievement Fixer also works with this. - Pretty much any mod that doesn't also adjust worker numbers should be good. - Technically, this mod allows for virtually any changes to Service buildings. At the moment, it mainly increases number of workers in Services buildings and other small adjustments. I encourage contribution to the mod and PRs on GitHub to expand the mod config abilities.
